Wine in Black

iOS App and Website for wine retailer

  • Product Design
  • iOS Strategy & Design
  • Web Design

When I first started out working with Wine in Black my team was briefed with designing, develop and launching the next generation wine purchasing App. What we released wasn't just a shop in the App Store but arguably the fastest and easiest way to purchase wine.

Ben Lau

The best wines only, available to order or re-order

This is the heart of berlin based Wine in Black. A team of experts sample hundreds of bottles of wine — they have the best job in the world — and selects only a few for the shop.
